scripts.docker: docker compose --profile production down && docker compose --profile production up -d --build
scripts.docker:dev: docker compose --profile development down && docker compose --profile development up -d --build
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node ./src/config/swagger.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node ./src/server.js
scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./src/config/swagger.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./src/server.js
scripts.server:dev: npm install && npm run docker:dev && npm run start:dev
